If we fill an empty array with 4 zero-filled:

```{node}
let arr = [...Array(4).fill([...Array(4).fill(0)])]
console.log(arr);
arr[1][2] = 1;
console.log(arr);
```

```{node}
let arr = Array.from({ length: 4}, e => Array(4).fill(0));
console.log(arr);
arr[1][2] = 1;
console.log(arr);
```
